intro: Lines 98 Classic — Plan your moves. Build perfect lines.
description:
Lines 98 Classic is a legendary puzzle game familiar to many since childhood. Connect balls of the same colour into lines horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to clear the board and earn as many points as possible.

With simple rules and intuitive controls, the game is easy to pick up but offers deep strategic depth. A relaxing pace combined with an endless mental challenge makes Lines 98 Classic perfect for both quick casual sessions and long, thoughtful playthroughs as you aim to beat your high score.
